de.bioforscher.singa.structure.parser.pdb.structures

Interface StructureParser.AdditionalLocalSourceStep

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StructureParser.IdentifierStep
    Enclosing class:
    StructureParser

    public static interface StructureParser.AdditionalLocalSourceStep
    Using a local pdb installation, additional source steps might be used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StructureParser.MultiParser chainList(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Reads the provided chainIdentifier list from a file.
      StructureParser.MultiParser chainList(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String separator)
      Reads the provided chainIdentifier list from a file.

    • Method Detail

      • chainList

        StructureParser.MultiParser chainList(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Reads the provided chainIdentifier list from a file. Each line in the file should have the format: 
        [PDBId][separator][ChainId]
        The default separator is tab (\t).
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the chainIdentifier list file
        Returns:
        The MultiParser.

      • chainList

        StructureParser.MultiParser chainList(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                      java.lang.String separator)
        Reads the provided chainIdentifier list from a file. Each line in the file should have the format: 
        [PDBId][separator][ChainId]
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the chainIdentifier list file
        separator - The separator between the PDBId and the ChainId
        Returns:
        The MultiParser.
